description:
Donahue & Walsh, P.C.has a branch office in Elgin, from which we represent the rights and entitlements of clients throughout Cook and Kane counties and the surrounding areas who suffered an injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions.

Handling all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, we have achieved considerable success advocating on behalf of those adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, premises liability, dog bites and other avoidable tragedies. Moreover, we also handle workers' compensation claims for those injured while on the job as well as third-party claims arising from another party's negligence or wrongdoing.

No matter how complex your needs, you can rely on our law firm's team of experienced, dedicated lawyers to fight hard on your behalf to increase your chances of obtaining the full amount of compensation you deserve. Over the course of our history, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our plaintiff clients, and we promise to do all we can to see you and your family through this difficult and uncertain time in your life.

In addition to our Elgin branch location, our law firm has a main law office in McHenry and another branch office in Rockford, and we have become one of the region's leading legal practices for those in need. To find out more about how we can best assist you with your legal challenge, we invite you to contact Donahue & Walsh, P.C. by phone or through our website to schedule a free initial consultation.
